amendment.description: An amendment numbered 7 printed in House Report 115-786 to direct the Secretary to submit a plan to establish fully operational electronic monitoring and reporting procedures for the Northeast Multispecies Fishery.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Keating amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A007) offered by Mr. Keating.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Keating amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
